overview.en: Echoin (EC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Echoin has a current supply of 2,000,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of Echoin is 0.00392459 USD and is up 6.15 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $341,052.29 traded over the last 24 hours.
